document.full_text: burkina faso's president sacked his government and army chief on friday, national radio reported, after disgruntled soldiers went on the rampage in the capital and fired their weapons in an apparent mutiny.
document.title: burkina faso's compaore sacks government, army chief-radio
lines_and_colors: burkina faso's president sacked his government and army chief on friday, national radio reported, after disgruntled soldiers went on the rampage in the capital and fired their weapons in an apparent mutiny.
